import sys

def main():
    import sys
    lines = sys.stdin.read().splitlines()
    t = int(lines[0])
    ptr = 1
    for _ in range(t):
        n = int(lines[ptr])
        ptr +=1
        a = list(map(int, lines[ptr].split()))
        ptr +=1
        # compute the maximum beauty
        INF = float('inf')
        prefix_max = [ -INF ]*(n+1)
        prefix_min = [ INF ]*(n+1)
        for i in range(1, n+1):
            prefix_max[i] = max(prefix_max[i-1], a[i-1])
            prefix_min[i] = min(prefix_min[i-1], a[i-1])
        suffix_max = [ -INF ]*(n+1)
        suffix_min = [ INF ]*(n+1)
        for i in range(n-1, -1, -1):
            suffix_max[i] = max(a[i], suffix_max[i+1])
            suffix_min[i] = min(a[i], suffix_min[i+1])
        max_beauty = -INF
        # case 1: exclude one element
        for i in range(n):
            max_out = max( prefix_max[i], suffix_max[i+1] ) min_out = min( prefix_min[i], suffix_min[i+1] )
            current = 2*(max_out - min_out) if current > max_beauty:
                max_beauty = current
        # case 2: first n-1 elements
        max_out = a[-1]
        min_out = a[-1]
        max_in = prefix_max[n-1]
        min_in = prefix_min[n-1]
        current = (max_out - min_out) + (max_in - min_in)
        if current > max_beauty:
            max_beauty = current
        # case 3: last n-1 elements
        max_out = a[0]
        min_out = a[0]
        max_in = suffix_max[1]
        min_in = suffix_min[1]
        current = (max_out - min_out) + (max_in - min_in) if current > max_beauty:
            max_beauty = current
        print(max_beauty)
